Big Tech & Startups

OpenAI Launches GPT-5 with Major Reasoning Upgrades (4 minute read)
OpenAI has announced GPT-5 featuring significant improvements in mathematical reasoning and code generation. The model shows a 40% improvement on standard benchmarks compared to GPT-4.

Google DeepMind Releases New Open-Source AI Model (3 minute read)
Google DeepMind has released Gemma 3, a new family of open-source language models. The models range from 2B to 27B parameters and are designed for efficiency on consumer hardware.

The Rust 2024 edition has been officially released with async closures, improved pattern matching, and a new standard library networking module.
